thread.title: BRIEF-Great Panther Silver Says Qtrly Gold Production Increased 14 Pct To 5,931 Ounces

title: BRIEF-Great Panther Silver Says Qtrly Gold Production Increased 14 Pct To 5,931 Ounces

organizations.name: brief-great panther silver says qtrly gold production increased

text: 10 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Great Panther Silver Says Qtrly Gold Production Increased 14 Pct To 5,931 Ounces Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - Great Panther Silver Ltd: * GREAT PANTHER SILVER REPORTS FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - ‍Q4 2017 SILVER PRODUCTION INCREASED 12% TO 514,218 SILVER OUNCES VERSUS Q4 2016 ​ * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - Q4 2017 ‍METAL PRODUCTION INCREASED 21% TO 1,065,773 AG EQ OZ​ VERSUS Q4 2016 * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - ‍QTRLY REVENUE INCREASED 39% TO $17.4 MILLION VERSUS Q4 2016 ​ * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - QTRLY GOLD PRODUCTION INCREASED 14% TO 5,931 OUNCES * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - ‍FOR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS PRODUCTION TO BE IN RANGE OF 4.0 MILLION TO 4.1 MILLION AG EQ OZ (AT A 70:1 SILVER TO GOLD RATIO)​ * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - SEES FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES, EXCLUDING ACQUISITION COST AND CAPITAL $2.5 - $3.5 MILLION * GREAT PANTHER SILVER LTD - FOR 2018 AISC GUIDANCE RANGE IS $12.50 TO $14.50 Source text for Eikon:
